name: Descent (Kino)
description:
Descent

Haxe Winter Jam 2023 Entry

 

Controls: 
Left Mouse Btn : Fire
Right Mouse Btn: Throw knife 
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
ESC to Pause
R to retry immediately

Story

You are trapped in  an elevator perpetually repeat the same levels again and again until you clear all of the obstacles set for you by the one who put you here.

The liftman greets you and tells you the only way out of here is to go down.

Beat all the levels and break the vicious cycle.

Credits

Kino  - Game Design/Programming/Art
JDShertbert  - Music & SFX

Note: Some royalty free SFX has been used as well.
